title: Beer-Like Apple Juice Jelly / Jello
directions: Transfer 3 tbsp. of apple juice into a large microwavable bowl. Then add gelatin powder and mix well. Cover and microwave at 500w for 30 seconds, and mix well again.
Add the rest of the apple juice, float the bottom of the bowl in ice water, mix slowly with a whisk for 6 minutes: it is about the time the mixture reaches 18C (64F).
Remove the bowl from the ice water, then mix quickly for 15 seconds to make the foam.
Serve in glasses and cool in the fridge for about an hour to set.
